name: Project Ravensdale (Canceled)
blurb: We are back with an outrageous run&gun platformer with stunning visuals and ridiculous humor for 1 - 4 players in local or online play!

rewards.reward: No Reward
INNOCENT BYSTANDER - Don't move along, there is something to see! You will be able to follow our updates as the campaign progresses. Welcome to Project Ravensdale, backer!

OBSERVER - Get it started! You get access to our backer-only development forum where we share the latest news ahead of press releases. You will also receive regular e-mails with important updates or announcements regarding the campaign and production and will receive a spiffy Grunt level forum badge showing your commitment.

ADVANCE SCOUT PACK - Those willing to help from the start get a digital release copy of the game at a reduced price! This tier contains the same benefits as the SCOUT PACK, but is limited, so get them while they\u2019re hot!

SCOUT PACK - Get a DIGITAL COPY of the game, along with a VOTING slot to influence the game as it is in production. See the explanation of the voting system on the main site for details. You also get a Scout level forum badge, developer forum access and e-mail updates about Ravensdale before the rest of the world.

DIGITAL STARTER PACK - You get all the benefits of the SCOUT PACK. In addition, you get a backer-exclusive BANNER FOR YOUR IN-GAME CHARACTER which shows off your support to other players. You also get a PDF of The Art of Ravensdale!

SCOUT BUDDIES PACK - Contains TWO  SCOUT PACKS. Ravensdale is best enjoyed with friends so here is your chance to grab TWO DIGITAL COPIES of the game at a reduced price to honor your early commitment! You can assign the second pack to a person of your choosing.
DIGITAL SOUND PACK - In addition to the contents of the DIGITAL STARTER PACK, you get the ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK of the game in MP3 and FLAC format for download!

BETA ASSAULT PACK - You get access to the CLOSED BETA events! Play Ravensdale early and help us even more to make the game as good as it can be. Your feedback will be critical to polishing the game and to honor that, your name will appear in the credits! Additionally contains all the rewards and benefits of the DIGITAL SOUND PACK plus an Assault level forum badge.

GET PHYSICAL PACK - This pack contains a RELEASE COPY of the game in an Amaray case for your collection! Additionally, you will get a Ravensdale BACKER PIN and a collection of four Ravensdale CONCEPT ART PRINTS. You also gain the digital benefits of the DIGITAL SOUND PACK!

DIGITAL DELUXE PACK - You will receive a backer-exclusive WEAPON SKIN and CUSTOM WEAPON EFFECTS to wreak havoc like only a backer could ! This pack also includes all the benefits of the BETA ASSAULT PACK!
IN EXTREMO BASIC PACK - This pack includes a physical copy of the RAVENSDALE SOUNDTRACK as well as a RAVENSDALE/IN EXTREMO T-Shirt. In addition, you get all rewards from the DIGITAL SOUND PACK.

ALPHA ASSAULT PACK - You get ACCESS TO THE ALPHA of the game, playing it before anyone else! Keep in mind that this won\u2019t be a finished game at the time and we may request specific tasks in order for the dev team to get the most benefit. However with this, you get the most involved in the production of Ravensdale. Your feedback will shape the game! In addition you receive all the rewards and benefits of the DIGITAL DELUXE PACK, plus an Alpha level forum badge.

PHYSICAL DUAL PACK - Contains TWO GET PHYSICAL PACKS. Want to surprise a friend with a boxed copy? Ravensdale is meant to be played with friends, so use this chance to get two physical copies at a reduced price!

PURE GAMING PACK - This pack contains a METAL DVD CASE WITH THE RELEASE COPY of the game, exclusive to the Kickstarter! In addition to this, you gain all the benefits of the ALPHA ASSAULT PACK, including access to the game\u2019s Alpha and Beta stages. Game on!

IN EXTREMO PACK - For In Extremo fans, we have a real treat! You get a copy of their NEWEST ALBUM \u201cKunstraub\u201d, hand-signed by the band! In addition, you get the backer-exclusive WEAPON SKIN and CUSTOM WEAPON EFFECTS . This pack also includes all items from the IN EXTREMO BASIC PACK.

BIG GRAB PACK - You will receive a HARDCOVER COPY OF THE ART OF RAVENSDALE BOOK, a RAVENSDALE T-SHIRT and a set of BFG DOG TAGS engraved with your name (or a name of your choosing). This tier also includes all rewards from the GET PHYSICAL PACK. Furthermore, you can participate in the CLOSED BETA of the game and you get an Assault level forum badge and your name in the credits of our game.

COLLECTOR PACK - You will receive an in-game, KICKSTARTER-EXCLUSIVE ARMOR for your character! In addition, this pack combines the BIG GRAB PACK and the GAMER EDITION PACK, giving you all the physical rewards along with the backer-exclusive metal DVD case. You also get a Hero level forum badge to show your commitment to our game in the forums! Your name will go into a special section in the credits, too!

WALLSCROLL PACK - In addition to the contents of the COLLECTOR PACK, you will get a 60 cm by 120 cm printed cloth RAVENSDALE WALLSCROLL. Additionally, you can submit a PHRASE OR GREETING to us, which we will PUT INTO THE GAME for all players to see as posters or graffiti! (We reserve the right to ask for resubmissions if the message is unacceptable due to rating or content considerations.)
SUBSCRIBER - In addition to the contents of the WALLSCROLL PACK, you get a LIFETIME DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTION to all games made by Black Forest Games for a single platform! (See the FAQ for details)

MEET IN EXTREMO (EINDHOVEN) PACK - \u201dSieben\u201d carries a special meaning for In Extremo and this is a special tier for In Extremo fans! You and a friend will be on the GUEST LIST of the concert in EINDHOVEN (October 22nd, 2013), granting you access to the show. But before the show starts, you get to MEET IN EXTREMO in person, get a personal TOUR OF THE STAGE and more! In addition you get all the benefits of the IN EXTREMO BASIC PACK. Please see the FAQ for details.

Please see the FAQ for details.

GET HEARD PACK - In addition to the contents of the SUBSCRIBER PACK, we will let you decide on what you want to hear (and everyone else hears) when creatures of Ravensdale attack! Orcs, goblins and other creatures will additionally use a phrase coined by you as a battle cry in-game. (We reserve the right to ask for resubmissions if the message is unacceptable due to rating or content considerations.) In addition, you will receive FOUR copies of the game!

LIFETIME PACK - In addition to the contents of the GET HEARD PACK  you will receive a LIFETIME DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTION to all games made by Black Forest Games for ALL platforms the game is released on (see FAQ for details on the subscription)!

MEET THE MAKERS - Whoa, you\u2019re amazing! You gain all the benefits of the GET HEARD PACK. \r\nAdditionally, we will welcome you and a friend of yours to the Black Forest Games headquarters for two days. You\u2019ll get a TOUR OF THE STUDIO and exclusive, hands-on testing of the game! After that, you can test your mettle in a paintball match against the BFG squad. You will be accommodated at the EUROPA PARK, to which you get VIP access to enjoy it\u2019s attractions on day 2 of your visit !

LEGENDARY PACK - To us, YOU ARE LEGEND ! All benefits of the MEET THE MAKERS PACK are included in this tier. To make your visit even more special, we will create a commemorative bust of you (or your likeness). We will place this not only in our offices but will also include a digital version in every future game we create (we reserve the right to ask for resubmissions if the pictures are unacceptable due to rating or content considerations). Your contribution to our project and our company will forever be remembered!
